title: Number of 1 Bits
description:
Write a function that takes the integer n and returns the number of 1 bits in its binary representation (also known as the Hamming weight).

Example:
  Input: n = 11
  Output: 3
  Explanation: 11 in binary is 1011, which has three 1 bits.
test_code:
require_relative './solution'
require 'minitest/autorun'

class TestSolution < Minitest::Test
  def test_eleven
    assert_equal 3, hamming_weight(11)
  end

  def test_power_of_two
    assert_equal 1, hamming_weight(128)
  end

  def test_large
    assert_equal 30, hamming_weight(2147483645)
  end
end
